message: I have a great product for you, Bob. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $135, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $137.50?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit lower on my budget. Would you be willing to consider $132.50?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $133, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $134?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $131?
I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $132, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $132.25?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to consider $130.50?
I can see you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $131, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $131.25?
I really appreciate your time and effort, Alice. I'm willing to make a final offer of $130. If that's not acceptable, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
